_header: I am despised as man forsake
Subjects: translations; illustrations, verse accompanying; sinner, lament of
_description: Lament of a sinner — five couplets translating Latin hexameters which appear on an imago humilis

BodLatTheD1.First Lines:
I am despysid as man for-sakeCuryd with erth to wurmys
                    make…
BodLatTheD1.Last Lines:
…Se þus I am peynted herMeke yddyng to doon in all
                    maner
